extendedInfo.description: The default security code is 0000Anti spy phone systemAnti theft phone alarm. Protect your phone from theft and nosy people.Android alarm system have the capability of causing panic and ignoring of rational thoughts of the burglar. In order to activate the alarm just press Arming button and the security system will be automatically armed after 10 sec and will be activated when movement or touch of the phone is registered.To change the sensitivity go press menu -> sensitivity settingsDON'T FORGET The default security code is 0000In order to change the security code press menu -> change security code input the old code (by default 0000) in the upper text box and the, new code in the next text box then press apply buttonThe minimum length of the code is 4 symbols

reviews.title: Great app!!!!
reviews.comment: This is just what I was looking for.... It works really well , highly recommended....
reviews.author: Brandon Keif
